formattedAddress: 10 Lincoln Center Plaza, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 10 Lincoln Center Plaza, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: I can definitely see why this place topped so many lists of best new restaurants in 2023! I came here for my birthday and the dinner was amazing - truly innovative and such a wonderful array of flavors. Service was friendly and efficient throughout the evening with the server helping us decide how much to order between us (we wanted to try it all) - the answer was 4 small plates and a main. We went with many of those that have been so highly recommended here - the goat patties, dumplings, oxtail/crab Rangoon, okra, and the short rib pastrami as the main. Faves were the oxtail/crab Rangoon - great texture and flavors and the pastrami - tender, fall of the bone deliciousness with great spices. I felt the dumplings on the other hand were a bit too similar in profile to the superior Rangoon so might choose differently in a return visit. Otherwise, it was incredible evening - start to finish.

originalText.text: My good friend finally got us in for reservations on new years eve 2023. Overall I'd say it was a good experience. The service was top notch & that's what really stood out to me. The staff was friendly & very attentive. The food came quickly & it was also spectacular, however, be ready to cough up $$$$. Don't come here if you're a budget diner. Glad I was able to experience at least once. I'd be happy to come back to try out some of the other dishes on the menu but it was so difficult getting a reservation to begin with.  I think it's worth to patronize this establishment at least once if you can but I'm not sure I get the full hoopla. It didn't seem that crowded when we went. Good luck & good eating ü§ûüèæüëåüèæüôÇ

originalText.text: I can see why this was rated the best restaurant in New York City. This is not simply a meal, but it is an experience. From the atmosphere to the cocktails to every single plate, it is impeccable. The plates are perfect. Balance of flavor and size. Loved the bodega brownie dessert. Definitely one of the best meals I have had in a very long time and look forward to coming in in the future. While it was difficult to find reservations ahead of time, we showed up right when the restaurant opened at 5:00 p.m. and we were able to get a table for two pretty quickly.

originalText.text:
I had the most Amazing Experience at Tatiana!! I watched the Today Show in July, and Kwame Onwuachi was on the show. I knew I had to try Tatiana after watching his segment.
I tried getting Reservations, but that proved to be a challenge, so I decided I would wait in line on a Thursday, Aug 31, to be exact. I got in line around 4:00/4:15 pm. There were about 20 people ahead of me, but luckily I was able to secure a seat at the bar.
I felt so lucky! From the Front of House Staff to the Bartender, wow what a Transformational Service experience.
My Drink was Amazing and the Food was Even better. I ordered the Curried Goat Patties as my appetizer (Wow, the flavors and the crispiness) and the Brown Stew Branzino (So good). I was so stuffed I couldn't even order dessert. The dessert choices sounded really good. I can't wait to come back and bring family/friends with me on this once-in-a-lifetime culinary journey, that is Tatiana!
